idea:
DeeVin Industries Pvt Ltd is all set to come up with a steel rolling plant having the capacity of 150,000 MTA on 7.33 acres of land at Abitgarh in Wada. It will be equipped with 175,000 MTA of Electric Induction Furnace for direct rolling of hot conditioned billets via CCM. Procurement of land, identification of key team members, vendor shortlisting, and other Phase 1 activity have been completed. 


As a Managing Director in a family-run steel rolling mill & power transmission plant (Maharashtra Group) for over 16 years, I have hands-on experience in overseeing the functioning of the steel plant in totality.


Leading various departments and teams has helped me inculcate varied perspectives that enable me to provide strategic direction.


Always driven to ethically maximise the bottom line through innovative ideas, increasing organisational efficiency, and reducing operational costs.


Over the last 16 years, I have built strong partnerships and fostered collaborative relationships with political and government personnel at the central and state level.
name: DEEVIN INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We do cold pressed cooking oils and want to do different blends of hair oils

idea: To carry on business of travels, tourist agents, package tour operators, contractors along with facilitating travelling either through manual booking or online services to tourists, travellers, such other customers and to make provisions for convenience of all related activities including but not limited to tickets booking, sleeper cars or berths, hotel or motel booking, accommodation guidance, money changer, advisory services, business advisory services and other allied services.

idea:
HREEJI WELD INDUSTRIES are fully geared with the requisite technical expertise and quality control mechanism, Which leads us to successfully meet even the bulk orders of the clients. Additionally, our streamlined administration, regular follow-ups with the clients and quick order dispatch has enabled us to win the faith and trust of the clients. Being a quality conscious concern, We have laid prime importance towards ascertaining the quality of our range of Hollow Sections. With the implementation of a quality management system, We ensure that each Product is duly tested and verified before leaving our premises.

SHREEJI WELD INDUSTRIES, has immensely contributed for the growth of industries, Along with introducing steel produced from modern steel mills in the country, SHREEJI WELD INDUSTRIES is committed to make available quality steel to the entrepreneurs of various segments.
name: shreeji weld industries

idea: Climatique Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is a cleantech enterprise working on sustainable resource management for Industries, Institutions and Urban bodies. We believe that nothing in the world is waste. We preserve natural and man-made resources by unlocking the value of waste using the power of technology. We provide end-to-end resource management solutions to make life circular and clean. We offer state-of-the-art plasma gasification systems, an efficient, clean and safe method for waste treatment.
name: CLIMATIQUE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Techno ERP Solutions is one of the India's leading ERP solutions provider company. Launched in 2009, it has quickly grown to have 100+ customers across India. We are certified partner with SAP and dealing in the SAP Business One product.

We are have a Team of over 75+ Technical and Functional Consultants with Senior guys having experience of more than 15 Years in ERP Implementation.

Techno ERP Solutions has a successful track record for delivering on time, within budget, state-of-the-art IT solutions to a broad range of global clients. From single problem applications to complete turnkey operations.
name: Techno ERP Solutions
